Own Web offer affordable and reliable Master Reseller Hosting, Alpha Reseller Hosting and standard Reseller hosting based in London, UK powered by cPanel and DirectAdmin. All Reseller packages include Anti DDoS protection, Daily backups, Dedicated IP, SitePad website builder, CloudLinux, Litespeed server, unlimited SSL certificates and Softaculous app installer.

**DirectAdmin Reseller Features:**
• Dedicated IP Address (On selected Pacakges)
• Daily offsite Backups
• Sitepad Website Builder
• Multi PHP & Python Selector
• Softaculous App Installer
• CloudLinux with CageFS enabled
• Mod_lsapi Enabled
• Litespeed Webserver installed
• Anti DDoS Protection
• Unlimited MySQL Databases
• DirectAdmin Control Panel
• Unlimited SSL Certificates
• UK based Servers
• Instant Setup

**Payment Methods:**
• PayPal
• Credit or Debit Card
• Bitcoin

**Why choose Own Web?**
Our average uptime is 99.99% and have nodes that have achieved over 400 days of uptime and counting with a service level agreement of 99.95%. Our SLA also includes two hours response for support tickets but our average response time is 23 minutes. We are also generous with our shared hosting Cloudlinux limits. with optimized configuration on blazing fast servers. For people who use our VPS services they a get free Windows license, free IPv6 addresses, free snapshot backups and low cost discounts across arrange of other licenses and services.

We are also happy to support our customers via live chat, however this is only if we have the time available and people that are using our management services get priority.

**Can I buy additional cPanel accounts?**
Yes, you can buy additional cPanel accounts via checkout or at anytime from £0.15p each.

**Have you got a test IP / Looking glass?**
UK IPv4 IP: 51.89.201.152
UK IPv6 IP: 2001:41d0:800:2254:0002:0002:007d:94a1
UK Looking Glass: http://51.89.201.152

**What is your refund policy?**
We have a 7 day, no questions asked full refund policy. This is excluding our Lowend VPS range, which you can find more information about in our terms of service.

**Can I upgrade my CloudLinux limits & resources?**
Yes, you can see the prices for more resources on our website here.
